text:
There are no files in the binaries or sources download dirs referenced from
page: http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/installation/download.html. If there aren't
supposed to be any, you might want to update the download page to say so.

As a side note, trying to build and deploy lenya for the first time using the
latest cvs version is a nightmare. Various things go wrong. One example is that
the task class for XConfTool isn't created in the right place and doesn't seem
to exist anywhere in the lenya tree. Had to grab a copy from the cocoon file
tree. There are various other things like this -- I've spent about two hours
trying, and given up for the time being (the build completes, but then tomcat
throws a major wobbly, apparently due to various files missing). I haven't
detailed everything, as I'm not sure if the current build is known to have
issues of this nature.
